definition[0]: a short thin stick used by a conductor (=the leader of a group of musicians) to direct the music
definition[1]: a short light stick that is passed from one person to another during a race
definition[2]: a short thick stick used as a weapon by a police officer
definition[3]: a short stick that is carried as a sign of a special office or rank
definition[4]: a light metal stick that is spun and thrown into the air by a majorette
